thread.title: US athletes welcome IOC decision on Russian suspension

title: US athletes welcome IOC decision on Russian suspension
text:
US athletes welcome IOC decision on Russian suspension Sunday, February 25, 2018 - 00:49 
US bobsledder Elana Meyers Taylor welcomes the IOC's decision not to allow Russian athletes to march behind their national flag at the closing ceremony ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
US bobsledder Elana Meyers Taylor welcomes the IOC's decision not to allow Russian athletes to march behind their national flag at the closing ceremony Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CIQwAy
